name: Sumo (itch) (Remote Dev)
description:
Made for the Beginners Circle Jam #4 by:

Remote Dev

ShyDandelion: https://www.twitch.tv/shydandelion_

-------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Player 1: A/D to move left and right, W to jump.

Player 2: J/L to move left and right, I to jump.

ESC to pause.
